entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
